content: संहन् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To unite closely together, join together; हस्तौ संहत्य <ls>Ms. 2. 71</ls>; दूत एव हि संधत्तं भिनत्त्येव च संहतान् <ls n="Ms.">7. 66</ls>; see संहत. {@--2@} To heap, collect, accumulate. {@--3@} To contract, diminish. {@--4@} To strike, kill, destroy. {@--5@} To strike against each other, clash.
